Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Central Park

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Madison/Kildare
ShortDescription: EB 20 Madison buses are rerouted via Madison, Kostner, Jackson, Pulaski, then resume their normal route on Madison due to police activity near Madison/Kildare.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Kostner, Jackson, Pulaski, then resume their normal route on Madison due to police activity near Madison/Kildare.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
